history.proof: intros a1 a2 b1 l. revert a1 b1. induction l as [ | [b n] l' IHl]. - simpl. intros. sfirstorder depth: 3. - simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a2 b) as [eq | neq]. + intros a1. sfirstorder depth: 3. + intros a1. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: induction l as [ | [b n] l' IHl].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: induction l as [ | [b n] l' IHl].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros a1 a2 b1 l. revert a1 b1. induction l as [ | [b n] l' IHl]. - simpl. intros. right. apply in_eq. - simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a2 b) as [eq | neq]. + intros a1. intros [eq_ab | in_add]. * subst. now left. * destruct (IHl a1 n in_add) as [eq_an | in_l]. -- left. auto. -- right. now apply in_cons. + intros a1. intros [eq_ab | in_add]. * now left. * destruct (IHl a1 b1 in_add) as [eq_an | in_l]. -- left. now right. -- right. now apply in_cons.
